verbs.description: sunday first warning forecast frost advisory in effect from 2 [V: am] until 8 am monday for sussex southampton and northampton n c counties high pressure will build in on sunday making for a nice dry stretch of weather a few clouds sunday morning with clearing skies throughout the day
